casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Marvin Gene RAY. No. 76P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Marvin Gene Ray, Pro Se. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Valerie M. Asbell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 10th day of February 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Bertie County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2006."
